phpgsg.quickPick.constructor_placeholder: Select properties to generate constructor arguments
phpgsg.config.title: Getter Setter Generator
phpgsg.config.autoGenerate.description: Skip the quick pick window and automatically generate all available getter/setter methods
phpgsg.config.sortMethods.description: When organizing methods, you can prioritize getters or setters, or mix them up.
phpgsg.config.orderBy.description: When sorting the methods, you can choose to sort alphabetically or by the property order specified in the class.
phpgsg.config.indentSize.description: Determines the size (in number of spaces) of an indent.
phpgsg.config.indentWithTab.description: Use tab character instead of space as indentation character. (indentSize option is calculated as 1)
phpgsg.config.fluentInterface.descriptio: Adds `return $this;` to setter methods for fluent interface (method chaining).
phpgsg.config.contextMenu.title: Context Menu Options
phpgsg.config.contextMenu.constructor.de: Show `Generate Constructor` option in context menu.
phpgsg.config.contextMenu.getter.descrip: Show `Generate Getters` option in context menu.
phpgsg.config.contextMenu.setter.descrip: Show `Generate Setters` option in context menu.
phpgsg.config.contextMenu.getterAndSette: Show `Generate Getters and Setters ` option in context menu.
phpgsg.errors.no_class_found: A PHP class was not found in the file.
